price: Бу бир эслатмадир. Шак-шубҳасиз, тақводор зотлар учун гўзал оқибат бордир.
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
